channel.title: Process-PK [ ECO ]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jty8f.png[/img]
[IMG]http://sg-forum.info/imgs/home.png[/img][url=http://www.process-pk.com]Website[/url]
[B]Introduction -[/B]
I originally had the idea of starting a bounty hunter based server, but considering there's quite a few of then out there already, I happened to of changed my mind on it. I didn't do this purely on my choice, I got convinced by friends / server supporters, they told me it will bring more players and they'd much rather prefer a nice eco to play on. I will be using the same base as before just changing it to eco standards and making bounty hunter an option in the mini-game teleport.[/CENTER]
[B][U]Staff list -[/U][/B]
[B]Programmers:[/B]
[ul][li]Dan. [/li][/ul]
[B]Administrators:[/B]
[ul][li]Harry. [/li][/ul]
[B]Moderator:[/B] - [B]Contributor:[/B]
[ul][li]Loveandpower. [/li][/ul]
[B]Forum Moderator:[/B] -
[B][U]Skills -[/U][/B]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122084602/runescape/images/thumb/5/51/Attack-icon.png/21px-Attack-icon.png[/img] [B]Melee:[/B]
[ul][li][color=green]Correct following and distances.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct weapon speeds.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, attack and defence).[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Perfect hit delays.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122082216/runescape/images/thumb/7/72/Ranged-icon.png/21px-Ranged-icon.png[/img] [B]Range:[/B]
[ul][li][color=orange]Correct projectiles and animations.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, accuracy and defence).[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct bow and crossbow speeds.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct distances and hit delays.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Perfect following.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122182528/runescape/images/thumb/7/77/Magic-icon.png/21px-Magic-icon.png[/img] [B]Magic:[/B]
[ul][li][color=orange]Correct graphics, distances, magic effects and spell speed.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Perfected hit delays.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct distance and magic following.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, accuracy and defence).[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=orange]Perfected NPC sizes.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122223429/runescape/images/thumb/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png/20px-Runecrafting-icon.png[/img] [b]Runecrafting:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Use of the Abyss.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]All altars working.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct multiple crafting.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Use of Pouches included.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122221425/runescape/images/thumb/8/84/Agility-icon.png/18px-Agility-icon.png[/img] [b]Agility:[/b]
[ul][li][color=orange]Gnome, Wilderness, Pyramid and Brimhaven courses usable.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=orange]All obstacles around the map.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations used.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122235048/runescape/images/thumb/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png/21px-Herblore-icon.png[/img] [b]Herblore:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Correct animations.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]All potions can be made.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=orange]Correct first and secondary ingredients.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=orange]Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion).[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122201602/runescape/images/thumb/f/f3/Thieving-icon.png/21px-Thieving-icon.png[/img] [b]Thieving:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]NPC thievery working with correct stunning formula.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations and graphics used.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122200319/runescape/images/thumb/7/77/Fletching-icon.png/21px-Fletching-icon.png[/img] [b]Fletching:[/b]
[ul][li][color=orange]All logs can be fletched.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=orange]Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log).[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Can string bows.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Can fletch crossbow bolts and tip them.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121214707/runescape/images/thumb/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png/19px-Slayer-icon.png[/img] [b]Slayer:[/b]
[ul][li][color=red]Five global slayer masters.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=orange]Rewards system.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Easy, medium, hard slayer tasks.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Can sell monster heads to slayer master for money.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Slayer gem working.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]All equipment working.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct requirements for slayer monsters.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122191028/runescape/images/thumb/2/28/Mining-icon.png/21px-Mining-icon.png[/img] [b]Mining:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All ores can be mined.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct pickaxe finding and animations.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122232122/runescape/images/thumb/d/df/Smithing-icon.png/21px-Smithing-icon.png[/img] [b]Smithing:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All bars can be made.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]All bars can be smithed.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]All equipment can be produced.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122233049/runescape/images/thumb/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png/17px-Cooking-icon.png[/img] [b]Cooking:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Fish cooking.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=orange]Correct burning formula (can get cooking gauntlets from cooking guild).[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct animation and timing used.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Baking Cakes.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Baking Pies.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Making stews & Curries.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Pizzas.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120123002212/runescape/images/thumb/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png/21px-Fishing-icon.png[/img] [b]Fishing:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All fish can be caught.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct item requirements.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=orange]Fishing spots located all around the world.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121214504/runescape/images/thumb/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png/18px-Firemaking-icon.png[/img] [b]Firemaking:[/b]
[ul][li][color=orange]All logs lightable.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=orange]Adding and depleting of lightened logs.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Ashes appear after logs burn out.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122231156/runescape/images/thumb/4/48/Crafting-icon.png/21px-Crafting-icon.png[/img] [b]Crafting:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Gem cutting.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Hide cutting.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Hide tanning.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Jewellry Moulding.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Wheel spinning.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Clay molding.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122222711/runescape/images/thumb/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png/18px-Woodcutting-icon.png[/img] [b]Woodcutting:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Falling and regrowing trees.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct hatchet finding.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct hatchet animations.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Birds nests fall from tree.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122213351/runescape/images/thumb/f/f0/Farming-icon.png/21px-Farming-icon.png[/img] [b]Farming:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Can use basic seeds on patch.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Need to rake, dib and water.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[u][b]Bosses -[/b][/u]
[b]Giant Mole:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Correct animations used.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=orange]Correct digging spots and graphics used (does this under half health).[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct max hit, defence and attack formula.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[b]Kalphite Queen:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Surrounded by Kalphites.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct projectiles, maxhits and animations (multi hitting).[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Two forms to defeat.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[b]Dagannoth Kings:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Three different bosses.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct accuracy, max hit and defence formulas.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct projectiles and graphics used.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Spinolyps surrounding the battle area.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Spinolyps have their draining effect.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[b]Chaos Elemental:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Three attacks (disarming, teleporting and destroying).[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct projectiles and graphics used.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations used.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Multi attacking.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Perfect accuracy, defence and max hit formula.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[b]King Black Dragon:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Four breaths (Dragonfire, Icefire, Shockfire and Poisonfire).[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Perfect defence, max hit and accuracy formula.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Requires anti or dragonfire shield.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations and projectiles used.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Multi attacking.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[b]General Graador:[/b]
[ul][li][color=red]Three minions | Magic, Melee and Range.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Correct range attack (multi hits).[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Correct animations and graphics used.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Perfect formulas (defence, accuracy and max hit).[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[b]Kree'arra:[/b]
[ul][li][color=red]Three minions | Magic, Melee and Range.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Correct range and magic attack (multi hits).[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Correct animations and graphics used.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Perfect formulas (defence, accuracy and max hit).[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[b]Commander Zilyana:[/b]
[ul][li][color=red]Three minions | Magic, Melee and Range.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Has a special attack that charges up and attack opponent.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Correct animations and graphics used.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Perfect formulas (defence, accuracy and max hit).[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[b]K'ril Tsusaroth:[/b]
[ul][li][color=red]Three minions | Magic, Melee and Range.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Correct magic attack (multi hits).[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Correct animations and graphics used.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Perfect formulas (defence, accuracy and max hit).[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[u][b]Mini-games -[/b][/u]
[b]Pest Control:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]NPC vs NPC.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct interfaces.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[b]Fight Pits:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Correct timer.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]After entering, free-for-all.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Last fighter in gets tokkul as reward.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[b]Fight Caves:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Perfect monster effects.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct animations, projectiles and graphics used.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]End reward is firecape and tokkul.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[b]Warrior Guild:[/b]
[ul][li][color=red]Animators work perfectly.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Must have 100 tokens before entering the Cyclopes room.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Defender drop depending on what defender you have.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]10 tokens crumble every minute.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[b]Barrows:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]All brothers working with effects and so on.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Projectiles and graphics used are correct.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Must have 6 kills before entering the tomb and looting the chest.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Perfect rewards.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[b]Clue scrolls:[/b]
[ul][li][color=red]All three levels working.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]15-20 different clues to embark within those individual levels.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Correct rewards.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Correct monsters dropping.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]Saradomin and Zamorak mages (Level 3).[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[b]Mage Arena:[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Kolodian located in Mage Bank.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]All correct rounds.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Correct graphics, animations, requirements and projectiles used.[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Can obtain both staff and cape from Statue room.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[center][b]Media:[/b]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img89/3959/imagekwqf.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img585/460/hi2k.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img849/8346/hi3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img195/4272/hi10.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img90/5558/hi4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img821/1060/hi5z.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img717/7552/hi6u.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img846/816/hi7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img3/9716/hi8r.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img28/6362/hi11.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img196/5175/hi9v.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img90/6614/shopu.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: Process-PK [ ECO ]
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

[CENTER]

Website

Introduction -

I originally had the idea of starting a bounty hunter based server, but considering there’s quite a few of then out there already, I happened to of changed my mind on it. I didn’t do this purely on my choice, I got convinced by friends / server supporters, they told me it will bring more players and they’d much rather prefer a nice eco to play on. I will be using the same base as before just changing it to eco standards and making bounty hunter an option in the mini-game teleport.[/CENTER]

Staff list -

Programmers:

[ul][li]Dan.
[/li][/ul]

Administrators:

[ul][li]Harry.
[/li][/ul]

Moderator:

Contributor:

[ul][li]Loveandpower.
[/li][/ul]

Forum Moderator:

Skills -

Melee:

[ul][li][color=green]Correct following and distances.[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Correct weapon speeds.[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, attack and defence).[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Correct animations.[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Perfect hit delays.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]

Range:

[ul][li][color=orange]Correct projectiles and animations.[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, accuracy and defence).[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Correct bow and crossbow speeds.[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Correct animations.[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Correct distances and hit delays.[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Perfect following.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]

Magic:

[ul][li][color=orange]Correct graphics, distances, magic effects and spell speed.[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Perfected hit delays.[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Correct animations.[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Correct distance and magic following.[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Perfect combat formula(maxhit, accuracy and defence).[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=orange]Perfected NPC sizes.[/COLOR][/li][/ul]

Runecrafting:

[ul][li][color=green]Use of the Abyss.[/COLOR][/li]
